_comment: This file allows you to optionally add additional metadata for the Flex Template, its parameters and their validation rules.
name: File Copier
description: A Flex Template that copies files from an input bucket to an output bucket.

parameters.name: input
parameters.label: Input bucket
parameters.helpText: The path to the input bucket. Example: gs://your-input-bucket

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: Output bucket
parameters.helpText: The path to the output bucket. Example: gs://your-output-bucket
